code: import{useSuspenseQuery}from'@tanstack/react-query';import{BASE_URL,fetchInstance}from'../instance';export const getProductOptionsPath=productId=>"".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/products/").concat(productId,"/options");export const getProductOptions=async params=>{const response=await fetchInstance.get(getProductOptionsPath(params.productId));return response.data;};export const useGetProductOptions=_ref=>{let{productId}=_ref;return useSuspenseQuery({queryKey:[getProductOptionsPath(productId)],queryFn:()=>getProductOptions({productId})});};
